channel.title: christinasots_ TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from christinasots_

item.title: I found the perfect vegan brownie recipe on the @GuardianFeast app! There are so many vegan recipes on there! There are also loads of great features like the search bar which lets you search by your favourite chefs, dietaries, ingredients and meal type.
item.description: I found the perfect vegan brownie recipe on the @GuardianFeast app! There are so many vegan recipes on there!  There are also loads of great features like the search bar which lets you search by your favourite chefs, dietaries, ingredients and meal type.

item.title: In Cyprus and Greece, we LOVE our frappe, and this is how to make it if you don’t have the little electric whisk (which is as much of a staple as a toaster in most Greek/ Cypriot households). Can you tell I’m homesick! I’m going home to Cyprus in a few w

item.title: Greek style lemony potatoes. These are the easiest, fluffiest, softest potatoes around and they need to be on your Sunday table. Cooking them like this gets them so soft and allows the flavours of the lemon and seasonings to really get absorbed all the w

item.title: This bright and crisp salad is FULL of crunchy textures, MY FAVE :) Also nuts and seeds and plenty of herbs, all brought together with a zingy vinaigrette. Search 'spring salad' on my site for the full recipe! www.christina-soteriou.com
item.description: This bright and crisp salad is FULL of crunchy textures, MY FAVE :) Also nuts and seeds and plenty of herbs, all brought together with a zingy vinaigrette. Search 'spring salad' on my site for the full recipe! www.christina-soteriou.com

item.title: This is one of those dishes that has tonnes of layers, textures and flavours and is also filling and healthy. A perfect weeknight meal and the slaw is amazing all on its own. Type in 'aubergine' on my website for the full recipe! www.christina-soteriou.co
item.description: This is one of those dishes that has tonnes of layers, textures and flavours and is also filling and healthy. A perfect weeknight meal and the slaw is amazing all on its own. Type in 'aubergine' on my website for the full recipe! www.christina-soteriou.co

item.title: This is such a simple dish that comes together in no time, a perfect one for easy summer entertaining. Serve with a big salad and my garlicky pilaf for a full meal. To get the full recipe, type in 'cauliflower' on my website! www.christina-soteriou.com
item.description: This is such a simple dish that comes together in no time, a perfect one for easy summer entertaining. Serve with a big salad and my garlicky pilaf for a full meal. To get the full recipe, type in 'cauliflower' on my website! www.christina-soteriou.com

item.title: This is one of my favourite recipes from my cookbook, Big Veg Energy! I call it an 'adult' macaroni because it has all of the comfort but with the elevated flavours of balsamic, olives and garlic. To see the full recipe on my site, search 'macaroni' www.c

item.title: If you’re looking for a foolproof, whole food, plant-based ice cream recipe that tastes like pure summer, please try my sour cherry and vanilla ice cream! No ice cream machine needed. Type in 'cherry' on my site for the full recipe! www.christina-soteriou
item.description: If you’re looking for a foolproof, whole food, plant-based ice cream recipe that tastes like pure summer, please try my sour cherry and vanilla ice cream! No ice cream machine needed. Type in 'cherry' on my site for the full recipe! www.christina-soteriou

item.title: Pilafi me fide is a Cypriot classic, my mum makes it every week because it goes with almost everything and is so simple to put together. The vermicelli noodles are fried until golden to give a delicious nutty flavour and I love lots of garlic in mine! To
item.description: Pilafi me fide is a Cypriot classic, my mum makes it every week because it goes with almost everything and is so simple to put together. The vermicelli noodles are fried until golden to give a delicious nutty flavour and I love lots of garlic in mine! To

item.title: You can serve this slaw with anything from a salad to a curry to add a zesty and fresh crunch. Give it a go and let me know what you pair it with! The recipe is under Saucy Peanut Lentil Curry With Aubergines & Slaw on my website www.christina-soteriou.co
item.description: You can serve this slaw with anything from a salad to a curry to add a zesty and fresh crunch. Give it a go and let me know what you pair it with! The recipe is under Saucy Peanut Lentil Curry With Aubergines & Slaw on my website www.christina-soteriou.co

item.title: This is a super simple recipe, that comes together in no time and gets the most out of the spring produce. Search 'soup' onto my website for the full recipe www.christina-soteriou.com

item.title: Some rabbit food for you :) Maroulosalata: Greek lettuce salad. A staple for a reason. Measure with your heart but go heavy on the lemon, salt and vinegar. Also really good with chickpeas and capers! 🐢
item.description: Some rabbit food for you :) Maroulosalata: Greek lettuce salad. A staple for a reason. Measure with your heart but go heavy on the lemon, salt and vinegar. Also really good with chickpeas and capers! 🐢
